Notes: 0 is disabled, 1 is enabled. Driver keeps track of changes.
0 is reset completed, 1 is resetting. Allow get_point timeout of 15s, and do not have more than 4 self-tests disabled when calling as part of larger script or will timeout.
0 is not sleeping, 1 is sleeping. Driver keeps track of changes.
Pass string argument to print text to screen. Calling get_point here reads back the last string that was displayed.
Set_point to set LCD color (0-7): off, red, yellow, green, teal, blue, violet, or white
0 is restart completed, 1 is restarting.
0 is monochrome, 1 is RGB display

Units: yy mm dd hr min sec
Notes: Date and time. [yr mo day hr min sec]
0 is ammeter calibration disabled, 1 is ammeter calibration enabled.
Set timer in 15-min increments
Ammeter scale factor and offset settings
Current transfer range
Upper limit on current
0 is diode check disabled, 1 is diode check enabled
0 is echo disabled, 1 is echo disabled
0 is GFI self test disabled 1 is GFI self test enabled. A 0 in both redundant GFI registers will disable the self test.
0 is ground check disabled, 1 is ground check disabled.
Energy charge limit
Get_point to read current charge (in Ws) and sum of all charges (in Wh). Set_point to force sum of all charges (in Wh).
Charger service level L1/L2/Auto

Overtemperature thresholds. Currently non-functional on OpenEVSE v4
0 is stuck relay check disabled, 1 is stuck relay check disabled.
Timer start and stop time. When a timer is set and the device is sleeping, the charger will wake up to charge for the time duration, then return to sleep.
0 is vent required warning disabled, 1 is vent required warning enabled.
